english.segment1: Bury all the differences between us. When I still can't find the air, You keep the toxins flowing for me, And I'll bury all the differences between us. And I still can't help but care for moving mountains, But your, your head's held high again.
english.segment2: You will find me out. You will find everything.
english.segment3: We all, we just battle ourselves. We just battle ourselves again.
english.segment4: Bury all the differences between us, that same mechanic sound. That keeps on ringing for days and days. And you're standing like a clueless titan falls. And everything around falls right down on you. With your head held high again.
english.segment5: You will find me out. You will find everything.
english.segment6: We all, we just battle ourselves. We just battle ourselves again.
english.segment7: And there's a storm cloud waiting over, On the land that's sinking at the, At the bottom of these buildings again. With your head held high again.
english.segment8: You will find me out. You will find everything.
english.segment9: We all, we just battle ourselves. We just battle ourselves again.
